BV602_1: The diversification effects reported in S.26.03 - Solvency Capital Requirement - Life underwriting risk are different from the difference between the nSCR and the sum of the capital charge for each risk submodule: mortality, longevity, disability-morbidity, lapse, life expense, revision and life catastrophe. -->Template 1: S.01.01; Template 2: S.26.03; Columns: c0060;0080; Expression: If {S.01.01, r0520,c0010}=Reported then {S.26.03, r0800, cNNN}={S.26.03, r0900, cNNN}-({S.26.03, r0100, cNNN}+{S.26.03, r0200, cNNN}+{S.26.03, r0300, cNNN}+{S.26.03, r0400, cNNN}+{S.26.03, r0500, cNNN}+{S.26.03, r0600, cNNN}+{S.26.03, r0700, cNNN})
